name: The Blade of Truth
description:
Notus arrives at his apartment after work, only to realize that there is a bright light coming from behind the door. When he opened the door, he realized that that was not his apartment but an entire different dimension.

EARLY ACCESS PLEASE REPORT BUGS AND SUGGESTIONS.

MULTIPLAYER MUST BE TEMPORARILY TURNED OFF

Controls:
A-Left
D-Right
SPACE-Jump
LEFT CLICK-attack
R-Radio
